Articles.Content:
Does anyone know of a current mod(ksp1.2.2) that allows use of low thrust over time.

I've tried orbit manipulator,  Nbody, and a few others but as none were up to date nothing works although one of these mods is trying cos if I have the engines firing and try to warp it kills the warp instantly and continues at full throttle.
you can do a 4x physics warp like you get when your in atmosphere by holding the alt key when you push >

Unfortunately my ship is over 200 parts, 4x causes epic chaos.

Also I've got 2hours worth of xenon to use, I need more warpiness really

With the physics warp solution if 4x causes trouble then you won't go further with "more warpiness" - more physics warp is only increasing physics delta, causing more problems.

PersistentThrust mod is probably the way out. I'm not using it so I can't tell how good it is, though.

2 hours ago, Palaceviking said:

Unfortunately my ship is over 200 parts, 4x causes epic chaos.

Really?  I'm kinda surprised.  Ions are such low thrust, they generally don't cause stuff to go nuts, even on high physics warp.  Do you have high-powered reaction wheels, or something?  Ships that have problems at high physics warps can sometimes handle it better if they cut way back on their reaction torque (i.e. disable most of them).

Post a screenshot?
